items.text: The idea of ​​developing Cash Flash is born
The project is created
The operating team is defined
The business plan is developed; the whitepaper is defined
The launch of the cashflash.io website
The registration of trademarks and patents is planned
COVID19 emergency: development of 67% of the marketplace and 45% of the Blockchain
The company HQ and relevant bodies are decided in Lithuania, Vilnius
Wallets and related platforms are completed
The smart contract is completed
Main net tests show the absolute efficience of the operation
The ICO begins
Possibility to buy CFT tokens from the best exchanges
End of ICO and release on CoinMarket with an option to exchange money
Marketplace development deadline and start of testing
Blockchain development ends and testing begins
Bank Acquisition of Fiat currency
End of e-bank and exchange platform development for fiat and crypto currencies in CFT
Real estate acquisition for the on-campuses training
The anti-counterfeiting CPS and POS Blockchain are completed and ready for commercialization
The company is 100% operational

what.title:
What's
Cash Flash
what.sub: We are creating the first project with its real Certified and Guaranteed Marketplace.
what.text: The Cash Flash project was born with the intent to create a series of systems for both the customer and companies, incorporated in the first marketplace where it will be possible to buy everything in cryptocurrency. All stores will be able to use it as a means of payment with a dedicated POS. Furthermore, through Cash Flash Technology it will be possible to trace the products and counteract their counterfeiting.

paper.title: White Paper
paper.sub: Official company program viewable and downloadable in pdf, choose the language most convenient to you:
paper.text: Terms of service are rules by which you must agree to abide by to use a service. The terms of service may also simply be a disclaimer, particularly regarding the use of the websites.
paper.otherLanguagesTitle: or choose the language from the list below

team.title: Team
team.text: Cash Flash, unlike other projects in the sector, wants to give the opportunity to all the most competent people to be part of our team, with the aim of welcoming the project, excellences of all nations, to become a global project . Cash Flash was born from the entrepreneurial idea of Andrea Cerato, who shares the vision of a project focused on the opportunity to create a real ecosystem in the world of cryptocurrencies. Through the blockchain, new services are created both for the customer and for the company, creating a shorter and more performing supply chain.

items.title: Andrea Cerato
items.description:
36 years old Italian from Verona, specialized in civil and industrial electronics,cyber security , computer programming,

Specialized and experienced you have the highest levels in development and programming security in payment systems,

including both banking and military software, also specializing in algorithms for military use.

In 2006 he created Gray Screen, an efficient encryption system that has never been hacked.

Specialized in anti-fraud security systems, such as atm and Pos with advanced technologies,

such as tamper evident optical sensors, smart microphones and sensors. Creator of the former

self-control systems with gsm data modules for driving from

remote on multiple industrial machinery, such as washing machines, alarms, emergency sensors,

water flooding, gas leaks, etc ..

Consultant in government negotiations with various foreign states and top secret military entities,

contract negotiations for bridges, highways, schools, aqueducts, churches and fiber optics in underdeveloped countries

and finally negotiations for the sales of mines of gold, diamond and oil fields.

Through his knowledge, he knows payment methods for cash flow management,

knows widely the need and the shortcomings of the world financial system, in 2019 he decides

to found Cash Flash, wanting to contribute with all its know-how to create a cryptocurrency

and related blockchain to improve the current state of world marketing.

0.title: Computer programming
0.text: Faculty of Cybernetics, University of Bucharest

3.title: Security systems development
3.text: Creating anti-fraud systems, For ATM security, POS

items.title: Luca Cerato
items.description:
Founder and funder of cash flash

Expert in payment and software technologies and systems

Electro-mechanical engineer

In addition to cash flash, he manages his company WWW.fibiritalia.com

engaged in the design, manufacture and sale of machinery such as

robotics, washing machines, household appliances and development of payment systems,

centralized payment desks with payment systems such as:

EMV smart card credit cards, fidelity systems, etc.

With great ability and passion always in step with the best technology and decided

to create together with his brother ANDREA CEARTO a digital currency or rather futuristic Cryptocurrency

with the largest Marketplace in the world where you can buy goods, goods, services directly with CFT Token

connected to your own digital bank that converts all the currencies of the world in real time Fiat and crypto into a single CASH FLASH TOKEN currency

the only one accepted in the market place thus allowing a large daily exchange of cash flash and enhancing the currency itself, all connected

to a decentralized blockchain, where it will be possible for all users and companies to verify their own

products, authenticity, transaction, spare parts of the purchase made and product warranty etc.

By collaborating for over 3 generations with the largest global brands in the world, textiles and fashion, appliances, food, services, etc. we can

boast over 2 million important and well-known brands around the world which have agreed to be part of and sell their merchandise as well as in their boutiques

in our Marketplace which, after several agreements, the sales turnover generated by our entire consortium generates turnover of over 38 billion euros

destined to grow with our technology and online sales on the new CASHFLASH.IO platform

items.title: Roberto Baron
items.description:
33 years of Noventa Vicentina. Graduated in accounting and entrepreneur since 2004.

Interested in computer science and the evolution of technology since school

higher. He lives in London where he manages companies and works in the security field.

Passionate about crypto currencies since 2015, he wants to participate in a new service

and innovative usable by everyone for every commercial sector, contributing to

improve the safety and authenticity of products for daily use.

items.title: Iris Collu
items.description:
SPECIALIZED IN ACCOUNTING AND MANAGEMENT ADMINISTRATION IN SOFTWERE.

IT HAS A WIDE INTERNATIONAL EXPERIENCE APRESA IN THE FIELD WITH THE MOST IMPORTANT FINANCIAL AND DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTES.

AS TEAM LEAD MANAGER THE CORDINATION AND MAIN INTERFACE OF A PART OF THE ADMINISTRATION AND ENGINEERING TEAM

THE DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT OF BLOCKCHAING AND THE CURRENT DEVELOPMENT OF DESIGN UNDER

SUPERVION OF FOUDERS AND CEO.

items.title: Giancarlo Giacomelli
items.description:
I.T.I.S. graduate State Industrial Technical Institute Electrotechnical section;

Specialized in Sales and Marketing Techniques;

Selection, training and motivation of human resources in the commercial field;

Entrepreneurial management in various commercial companies.

This training was developed in the companies for which he carried out

professional activity, and by attending organized study sessions

by specialized structures, such as the “Mario Silvano” of Milan and the “Roberto Re” of Milan.

Registered in the C.C.I.A.A. of Verona role of commercial agents, in addition to the related pension

supplementary E.N.A.S.A.R.C.O.

PREVIOUS EMPLOYMENT 1st November 2009- 31st January 2019.

Mint services of the Italian State

Personal requirements are undoubtedly the great ability to adapt to different

roles in the professional field.

items.title: Roberto Pisa
items.description:
58 years old, born in New York to an English mother and an Italian father, he lived for over two years in New York, London, Athens, Beijing, Rome, Strasbourg, Brussels and in the United States (Hendersonville NC- Fairfield CT) . He obtained French Maurità (Bac Mathematics section), a degree from Bocconi University in Political Economy, an MBA while working at the University of Leuven (B), a PIM diploma from the HEC in Paris.

In 2013 he founded the CL Partners company, which operates as Advisory in operational and financial restructuring projects, for Banks, Funds or industrial companies.

Previously he worked for 7 years in one of the major European PE funds as Senior Partner, where he managed the restructuring of portfolio companies and where he followed some investment initiatives. He also worked for several industrial companies for 22 years and was, among other things, President and CEO of GE Lighting Systems, Chief Executive Officer of Pirelli SpA, CEO of Euralcom, CRO of the Fiat Group, CEO of Sirti SpA.

Early in his career, he worked for McKinsey & Co.

items.title: Pietro Carlini
items.description:
He always achieved top marks up

graduated in Business Economics from Bocconi University in Milan with 110 cum laude at the age of 23.

He subsequently operated in all financial markets and had and directed companies in the following sectors:

agriculture, commerce, printing, mechanical robotics and construction.

items.title: Dr. Carlo Antonio Mazzolla
items.description:
Independent financial advisor from Milan. Born in Saronno in 1976,

Graduated in Business and Economics, Graduated from Upsala College in East Orange, N.J.-USA.

He has worked with major international investment banks

and has distinguished himself in the protection of the saver.

items.title: Massimo Caminati
items.description:
Graduated in Communication "computer engineering"

University of Bologna, cesena (FC) - Italy

marketing training course

confartigianato, Forlì - Italy

meticulous technician, who excels at managing multiple tasks

simultaneously and in working under pressure. Vast

experience gained in the finance and crypto currency sector.

Sales and marketing representative with a customer-centric approach

and more than 15 years of experience in delivering solutions to customers. Solid

knowledge of the sectors mentioned above and good knowledge of economic development

of coins and digital technologies.

professional manager with excellent leadership skills e

development of interpersonal relationships.

items.title: Denise Zupcanova
items.description:
SPECIALIZED IN PAYMENT SYSTEMS AND CRYPTO CURRENCIES

GREAT SUCCESSFUL WOMAN WITH GREAT WORK EXPERIENCE

GERMAN MULTINATIONALS AND EUROPE IN THE DEVELOPMENT OF PAYMENT SYSTEMS AND

INDUSTRIAL

items.title: Milan Pesic
items.description:
WORKING EXPERIENCE



-Director of the customs administration of the Republic

Slovenia, organizes transit documents, import-export, transport,

I work with international clients from all over the world.



-work at the Instituto of Knowledge Europe



SKILLS

Knowledge of languages

foreigners: English, Italian, Croatian, German.



hardworking, positive, reliable, precise, independent, capable of

logical thinking, team oriented, cryptocurrency expert e

Professional treder, expert in economics and payment systems.
